All Classes All Packages

T

TAKEOFF - TaskType
Aircraft in TAKEOFF are waiting on taxiways for a slot to take off.
TakeoffQueue - Class in towersim.control
Represents a first-in-first-out (FIFO) queue of aircraft waiting to take off.
TakeoffQueue() - Constructor for class TakeoffQueue
Constructs a new TakeoffQueue with an initially empty queue of aircraft.
Task - Class in towersim.tasks
Represents a task currently assigned to an aircraft.
Task(TaskType) - Constructor for class Task
Creates a new Task of the given task type.
Task(TaskType, int) - Constructor for class Task
Creates a new Task of the given task type and stores the given load percentage in the task.
TaskList - Class in towersim.tasks
Represents a circular list of tasks for an aircraft to cycle through.
TaskList(List<Task>) - Constructor for class TaskList
Creates a new TaskList with the given list of tasks.
TaskType - Enum in towersim.tasks
Enum to represent the possible types of tasks an aircraft can have.
Terminal - Class in towersim.ground
Represents an airport terminal building, containing several aircraft gates.
Terminal(int) - Constructor for class Terminal
Creates a new Terminal with the given unique terminal number.
tick() - Method in class Aircraft
Updates the aircraft's state on each tick of the simulation.
tick() - Method in class FreightAircraft
Updates the aircraft's state on each tick of the simulation.
tick() - Method in class PassengerAircraft
Updates the aircraft's state on each tick of the simulation.
tick() - Method in class ControlTower
Advances the simulation by one tick.
tick() - Method in class ViewModel
Ticks the model and updates the state of the GUI.
tick() - Method in interface Tickable
Method to be called once on every simulation tick.
Tickable - Interface in towersim.util
Denotes a class whose state changes on every tick of the simulation.
togglePaused() - Method in class ViewModel
Toggles whether the simulation is paused.
toString() - Method in class Aircraft
Returns the human-readable string representation of this aircraft.
toString() - Method in class AircraftQueue
Returns the human-readable string representation of this aircraft queue.
toString() - Method in class ControlTower
Returns the human-readable string representation of this control tower.
toString() - Method in class Gate
Returns the human-readable string representation of this gate.
toString() - Method in class Terminal
Returns the human-readable string representation of this terminal.
toString() - Method in class Task
Returns the human-readable string representation of this task.
toString() - Method in class TaskList
Returns the human-readable string representation of this task list.
towersim - package towersim
Root package containing the GUI launcher and all sub-packages.
towersim.aircraft - package towersim.aircraft
Classes to represent different types and models of aircraft.
towersim.control - package towersim.control
Classes responsible for controlling the logic of the system, including the control tower.
towersim.display - package towersim.display
Classes responsible for creating the GUI of the application.
towersim.ground - package towersim.ground
Classes representing entities on the ground of an airport including terminals and gates.
towersim.tasks - package towersim.tasks
Classes related to an aircraft's task list and the individual tasks it is comprised of.
towersim.util - package towersim.util
Utility interfaces and application-specific exceptions.
tryLandAircraft() - Method in class ControlTower
Attempts to land one aircraft waiting in the landing queue and park it at a suitable gate.
tryTakeOffAircraft() - Method in class ControlTower
Attempts to allow one aircraft waiting in the takeoff queue to take off.
type - Variable in enum AircraftCharacteristics
Type of aircraft.
